content: This app is so helpful

content: Great app. I have used it to make large, complex Perler pieces. Love it!
replyContent: Hi Kathleen, thanks for the review and stars! I have seen some of the designs people are making in real life and its absolutely fantastic - the patience it requires :D

content: I don't generally leave reviews, however, this app is so good I've been compelled to write something positive. Works an absolute treat and does everything I need it to. We'll see how my first project comes out!
replyContent: Hi Richard, I am very grateful for every review and stars the app gets. Its a lot of work programming this thing and its nice to know that people appreciate it :-)

content: Pretty cool. Has lots of options and features but I cant figure out how to resize images to fit my board. The 2 images I have downloaded dont fit my board dimensions
Ive been using this app for a while and after trying other software, i always come back to this app. Its great how customizable it is. Very thought out. I love it.
I love this app!

Wish it was easier to share actual bead boards, but otherwise it's a great app thus far! Update: with the addition of thr txt and brd files, I can now send boards between phone and tablet. While I wish there was a share board ability, current improvement meets my needs.
Fantastic, just what I was looking for! The custom image is great, takes a minute to get used to, but super easy. The family is going to have a blast making cool new goodies!

Great app, great price!! The app is limited in transcribing the darker colour range, especially black, but thats due to the limited darker perler beads available. Also do yourself a favour & use this app on a larger screen tablet. Buy the app to support this dude!

It has many options and the color palette of different brands seems super complete, although it does not have an option that suggests the size that best suits your projects, which makes it difficult to start. Edit: After I used for a long time I watch a big and terrible problem with the is color match with the palette colors and the original image, for some reason the app add a lot of variety of colors who didn't exist in the original image, I loaded a image whit literally 10-15 colors and the app create the design with more than 30 colors and the worst part ir that colors dont even match in a bit. (IDKif I'm using it wrong) Other problem is the PNG formart not is exactly perfect for be printed but this is just an opinion
replyContent:
Hi Danao, the app uses an algorithm called dithering which will attempt to match the colors of your photo with colors available in the palette. If the image is green and you only have yellow and blue it will use these colors, and from a distance this will look green.
You can disable dithering by setting the slider to 0% when converting.
Br. Martin

content: Great app.. but colors need updated for perler, just a few
replyContent:
I just went through the Perler palette and I can't see which colors I am missing. Can you help me out? Please write to datscharf@gmail.com.
Maybe it is colors in the mixed bags which doesn't have their own product id?
Best regards
Martin

content: I love this app

Yeah its difficult to convert a photo to a small board and still have it look good. Try using only a section of the photo and adjusting the contrast to enhance visibility.

content: It is easy to use. I started making patterns right away.
Love it! Can do peyote patterns, beadloom patterns, and brick earring patterns. The only hard part is selecting which bead pallet to use or which beads to select when making my own pallet
Brilliant app!!

I'ts a good app I was using the free version which is very much the same however my patterns from the free version did not carry over. Also it would be awesome if the developer could update the perler midi palette and add the flamingo color. Thanks.
replyContent:

I know it can be irritating going from the free to the paid version. But you can copy the files yourself if you like. I will look a updating the palette in my next release.

content: Im new to this and the program is pretty intuitive and easy to use. It seems to over complicate the color selectio When importing simple images with only a few colors. Other than that its great!
replyContent: Thanks Paul, I know there is a lot of settings when converting, but its a very delicate balance between user friendliness and possibilities.

content: Downloaded yesterday. It has a slight learning curve. EDIT: Thanks to the developer for fixing the bug issue of the add/delete row buttons disappearing on mobile phones. I use this app now as my go-to bead designer. I do love that it has the most up to date Perler bead colors and that you can change beads easily.
replyContent:
Hi Kristie, thanks for the stars and the comments. I just found the bug that hid the add/remove row tools when the app was closed or minimized. The next release which is available in a week or so will have this fix :-)

Best regards
Martin

content: Love this app
Best companion for developing new creations with beads, wide variety of shapes, colors and brands.

Did not previously have a photo import button for a while. Got it figured out. I apologize for the harsh review because before the update that I couldn't use it this was my favourite bead app. Still is. Sorry again!
replyContent: Harsh reviews and bad ratings are ok when things doesn't work, and I am just grateful that you updated the review when the issue was resolved :D

content: awesome

Thanks Alison, 

that is really nice to hear :-) Please let me know if you find any issues or have any suggestions.

content: haven't used it for bead art yet.... but I will!
Very good app. the first one I ever bought and that says it all. Congratulations to developper for the amazing work. thank you
easy to use love it

perfect. I tried several pixel art apps trying to find something like this one but none of them quite met my needs. feature ideas: clone/group/export/import of smaller bead patterns (example, you create a star you want to use multiple times in one grid, you can clone it, and drag it as a group exactly where you want it. or export it into a file for use in a different grid later. ) printing patterns (to assist bringing your idea to life) exporting patterns to the cloud (cross device use)
I really like this app. I really wish it was available on iOS so I could use it on my iPad. all the ones on iOS suck compared to this one.
A really great program and it just keeps getting better and better. I have made some magnificent works of art. Thank you. ðŸ˜„
replyContent:
Thank you Allee! It makes all the long nights worth it when people appreciate the result :-)
Please let me know if you find any issues in the latest release at datscharf@gmail.com

Best regards
Martin

content: Really like the app but would love to be able to play with the dithering as I like using small pallets.
replyContent:
Control of dithering 0%-100% is now included in the latest release. You can completely disable it by setting it to 0%. Hope it helps you out.

BR
Martin

content: Great so far, would love the following two features. 1. No limit to zooming in. I place the pegboard directly above my phone to try and line up the squares with each pixel, since i dont use printed sheets, but the display is barely big enough to evenly line up. Zooming in further would fix this. 2. Would be nice if there was a toggle button that would basically change each bead on the board into its pixel counterpart, so instead of showing the round bead shape it would show a full square (pixel).
replyContent:
1. I will enable more zooming in the next version, no problemo!
2. I've thought about something similar, enabling people to change the type of media: beads, pixels, stiches, mindcraft blocks, lego and so on. Probably not something that will happen in the next release, but maybe sometime in the future.

Best regards
Martin

content: Great app! Thanks for fixing the Parrot Green, was very annoying ðŸ¤£ please add the new perler color (salmon, marshmallow, midnight, pewter, etc)
replyContent:
Thanks for the rating and review, and sorry for the parrot green :-). In many cases I have to color pick the bead colors from photos from the manufacturers, which is error prone.
I will take a look at the Perler palette shortly and add any missing colors.
Best regards
Martin

content: The app is great so far. The only issue I have is that I don't have the option to lower the dithering to remove the dotted look to it. Am I missing something or is this not in the app?

This is a truly amazing program for any beader. I use it for almost every single project I make. The recolor option is very useful, as is the option to choose my palette and to create custom board sizes. The only thing that is missing from that app is the ability to save and organize patterns in sub-folders; I have so many now that it's beginning to be difficult to find the one I want...
replyContent: Thanks a lot! I will try to get subfolders into my next release :-)

content: It's really great! When using your own photo you sometimes have to actually press the select palette button and repick the one you want not to get a blank canvas, so unlike what some people wrote that's not really an issue :) I love this app a lot!
replyContent: Thanks for the rating and review. I will look into the problem, thanks for describing what is going wrong, it really helps when trying to narrow it down :-)

content: So I paid for this app so I could make patterns from my own images but whenever I use the generate from photo option it just gives me a blank canvas! Worked the first couple of times but now nothing. Sort it out or its just a waste of money. I can find bead patterns on the Internet or pintrest, the whole point if this app was so I could make my own patterns from my own images.
replyContent:
Hi Jade, I know this is a long time ago, but I think I solved the problem. The problem was happening when using custom palette doing conversions. You needed to actively select it every time even though it was already selected. I have fixed it know so the conversion utility will read the custom palette every time :-)

Best regards
Martin

content: Great program to generate bead and pixel designs, the in app "generate from photo" is handy. Lots of bead brands covered and the new board shapes are so much fun.
The only thing i would add is a way to mark off the beads you have already done. it would save me hrs of correcting myself when im beading cause i always loose my place after a while.
It crashes everytime I want to save my pattern. It is useless if you cannot save your work.
replyContent:
Hi Gonzalo, I will gladly make a refund of your purchase if you are not satisfied what is your order number? The reason for the crashing was that Android has changed the permissions regarding accessing external storage. This should be fixed in version 7.2 (crossing my fingers). 
Best regards
Martin

content: also will this ever support round perler boards?
replyContent: The issue has been fixed in the recent update.

content: Great easy to use app. Only thing I would change is more board options (templates for the beads come in so many shapes, circles, stars, cars, flowers, etc. only square boards are on the app)

I adore this app. I spend tons of time making patterns for my perler beads. I do have a few notes that I would like to see maybe happen in the future: the colors could be truer to the perler beads real shades and maybe add the metallic, striped, and neon/glitter colors? That would make this app perfect!

This app is so helpful! I've tried a couple of small images and they came out great. Can't wait to make bigger projects with it. Would like to see a grid for the pegboards, because it's easier to calculate the amount of pegboards that you need. The grid that counts every 20 beads is fine, maybe if there is an option to switch between bead count and peg board that would make this app 11/10!
I make jewelry  and I love this for seed bead looming! I shared it with a beading page a Facebook and told them how great it is!!
replyContent:
Thanks a lot both for the rating and the sharing! It means a lot when spending a great deal on something that people find it useful!
Best regards
Martin

content: Finally an app that beat '' beadit!'' this is amazing it goes beyond the 120 something pegs that beadit! Offers. Plus the color combo is awesome A+ on this. I would like to see where one pegboard ends and the other begins.
replyContent:
Thanks for the rating! I am a bit unsure what you mean about "I would like to see where one pegboard ends and the other begins." if you could send me an email elaborating your idea I will do my best to improve the app!
